verses.verse: And the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> in the country <S%H7704><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> months. <S%H2320><s%>

And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the diviners, <S%H7080><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> shall we do <S%H6213><s%> to the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD? <S%H3068><s%> tell <S%H3045><s%> us wherewith <S%H4100><s%> we shall send <S%H7971><s%> it to his place. <S%H4725><s%>

And they said, <S%H559><s%> If <S%H518><s%> ye send away <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> send <S%H7971><s%> it not <S%H408><s%> empty; <S%H7387><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> in any wise return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H7725><s%> him a trespass offering: <S%H817><s%> then <S%H227><s%> ye shall be healed, <S%H7495><s%> and it shall be known <S%H3045><s%> to you why <S%H4100><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> is not <S%H3808><s%> removed <S%H5493><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> you.

Then said <S%H559><s%> they, What <S%H4100><s%> shall be the trespass offering <S%H817><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we shall return <S%H7725><s%> to him? They answered, <S%H559><s%> Five <S%H2568><s%> golden <S%H2091><s%> emerods, <S%H6076><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> golden <S%H2091><s%> mice, <S%H5909><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines: <S%H6430><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> one <S%H259><s%> plague <S%H4046><s%> was on you all, <S%H3605><s%> and on your lords. <S%H5633><s%>

Wherefore ye shall make <S%H6213><s%> images <S%H6754><s%> of your emerods, <S%H6076><s%> and images <S%H6754><s%> of your mice <S%H5909><s%> that mar <S%H7843><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land; <S%H776><s%> and ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> glory <S%H3519><s%> unto the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> peradventure <S%H194><s%> he will lighten <S%H7043><s%> <S%H853><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> you, and from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> your gods, <S%H430><s%> and from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> your land. <S%H776><s%>

Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> then do ye harden <S%H3513><s%> <S%H853><s%> your hearts, <S%H3824><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> and Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> hardened <S%H3513><s%> <S%H853><s%> their hearts? <S%H3820><s%> when <S%H834><s%> he had wrought wonderfully <S%H5953><s%> among them, did they not <S%H3808><s%> let the people go, <S%H7971><s%> and they departed? <S%H1980><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore make <S%H6213><s%> a <S%H259><s%> new <S%H2319><s%> cart, <S%H5699><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> milch <S%H5763><s%> kine, <S%H6510><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> which <S%H834><s%> there hath come <S%H5927><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> yoke, <S%H5923><s%> and tie <S%H631><s%> <S%H853><s%> the kine <S%H6510><s%> to the cart, <S%H5699><s%> and bring <S%H7725><s%> their calves <S%H1121><s%> home <S%H1004><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H310><s%> them:

And take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and lay <S%H5414><s%> it upon <S%H413><s%> the cart; <S%H5699><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> the jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye return <S%H7725><s%> him for a trespass offering, <S%H817><s%> in a coffer <S%H712><s%> by the side <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6654><s%> thereof; and send it away, <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> that it may go. <S%H1980><s%>

And see, <S%H7200><s%> if <S%H518><s%> it goeth up <S%H5927><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of his own coast <S%H1366><s%> to Beth-shemesh, <S%H1053><s%> then he <S%H1931><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> us <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> evil: <S%H7451><s%> but if <S%H518><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> then we shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> it is not <S%H3808><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> that smote <S%H5060><s%> us: it <S%H1931><s%> was a chance <S%H4745><s%> that happened <S%H1961><s%> to us.

And the men <S%H376><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so; <S%H3651><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> milch <S%H5763><s%> kine, <S%H6510><s%> and tied <S%H631><s%> them to the cart, <S%H5699><s%> and shut up <S%H3607><s%> their calves <S%H1121><s%> at home: <S%H1004><s%>

And they laid <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> the cart, <S%H5699><s%> and the coffer <S%H712><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the mice <S%H5909><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> and the images <S%H6754><s%> of their emerods. <S%H2914><s%>

And the kine <S%H6510><s%> took the straight <S%H3474><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of Beth-shemesh, <S%H1053><s%> and went along <S%H1980><s%> the <S%H259><s%> highway, <S%H4546><s%> lowing <S%H1600><s%> as they went, <S%H1980><s%> and turned not aside <S%H5493><s%> <S%H3808><s%> to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> or to the left; <S%H8040><s%> and the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them unto <S%H5704><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Beth-shemesh. <S%H1053><s%>

And they of Beth-shemesh <S%H1053><s%> were reaping <S%H7114><s%> their wheat <S%H2406><s%> harvest <S%H7105><s%> in the valley: <S%H6010><s%> and they lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> their eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark, <S%H727><s%> and rejoiced <S%H8055><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> it.

And the cart <S%H5699><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the field <S%H7704><s%> of Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> a Beth-shemite, <S%H1030><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> where <S%H8033><s%> there was a great <S%H1419><s%> stone: <S%H68><s%> and they cleaved <S%H1234><s%> <S%H853><s%> the wood <S%H6086><s%> of the cart, <S%H5699><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> the kine <S%H6510><s%> a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the Levites <S%H3881><s%> took down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and the coffer <S%H712><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was with <S%H854><s%> it, wherein <S%H834><s%> the jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> were, and put <S%H7760><s%> them on <S%H413><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> stone: <S%H68><s%> and the men <S%H376><s%> of Beth-shemesh <S%H1053><s%> offered <S%H5927><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> and sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> unto the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And when the five <S%H2568><s%> lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> had seen <S%H7200><s%> it, they returned <S%H7725><s%> to Ekron <S%H6138><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> are the golden <S%H2091><s%> emerods <S%H2914><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> for a trespass offering <S%H817><s%> unto the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for Ashdod <S%H795><s%> one, <S%H259><s%> for Gaza <S%H5804><s%> one, <S%H259><s%> for Askelon <S%H831><s%> one, <S%H259><s%> for Gath <S%H1661><s%> one, <S%H259><s%> for Ekron <S%H6138><s%> one; <S%H259><s%>

And the golden <S%H2091><s%> mice, <S%H5909><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> belonging to the five <S%H2568><s%> lords, <S%H5633><s%> both of fenced cities, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5892><s%> <S%H4013><s%> and of <S%H5704><s%> country <S%H6521><s%> villages, <S%H3724><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> stone of Abel, <S%H59><s%> whereon <S%H834><s%> <S%H5921><s%> they set down <S%H5117><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> which stone remaineth unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> the Beth-shemite. <S%H1030><s%>

And he smote <S%H5221><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Beth-shemesh, <S%H1053><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they had looked <S%H7200><s%> into the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> even he smote <S%H5221><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> men: <S%H376><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> lamented, <S%H56><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had smitten <S%H5221><s%> many of the people <S%H5971><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter. <S%H4347><s%>

And the men <S%H376><s%> of Beth-shemesh <S%H1053><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> is able <S%H3201><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> holy <S%H6918><s%> LORD <S%H3068><s%> God? <S%H430><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> whom <S%H4310><s%> shall he go up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> us?

And they sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Kirjath-jearim, <S%H7157><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The Philistines <S%H6430><s%> have brought again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> come ye down, <S%H3381><s%> and fetch it up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> to <S%H413><s%> you.
